website_summaries.verdict: The large tank and higher CFM rating of this machine is a perfect fit for larger jobs.
pros: You can have a normal conversation while standing right next to it
cons: At 90 pounds, it is not as easy to move around as some other units

customer_reviews.title: PURE JUNK!!!
customer_reviews.text: This air compressor is pure junk. It was quiet in the beginning and got even quieter when the motor went out after about 20 hours of use! This company obviously doesn't care about producing a qaulity product as evidenced by all of the negative reviews here. My previous air compressor was a cheap Walmart Campbell-Hausfield that lastest 18 years without a single problem while the California Air Tools compressor lasted only a few months under the same conditions. Do yourself a favor and steer clear of this company and thier products. They do not build qaulity products and do not stand behind thier products.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B

customer_reviews.title: I understand that the bottom of the tank isn't easy to reach because it is under the center of ...
customer_reviews.text: This compressor lost one star because of the location of the tank drain because it isn't at the bottom of the tank! It is hard to believe, but, the drain is set off to the side near the edge of the tank allowing about a half inch or so of water to stay in the tank after draining. You can tip the whole compressor up on one wheel to get all the water out if you want. I understand that the bottom of the tank isn't easy to reach because it is under the center of the compressor, but, I'd expect that a premium brand like this to design a drain that gets all the water out.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great compressor, super quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Could not be happier. I wanted a quiet compressor. I am not a contractor running air hammers and rotary tools. I needed air for my shop; I use brad and finish nailers, maintain my car, use a blow gun, and occasionally fill a portable tank for offsite projects. This compressor is fast, quiet, and well made. Some of the problems mentioned in earlier reviews have been fixed. The wheels fit right. The quality of manufacture is decent. It's not an Ingersoll Rand, but I can easily hold a conversation with the unit running, and still hear the radio, the tank fills quickly. And it is very compact - fits right into a corner of my shop.
customer_reviews.author: RJB

customer_reviews.title: Quietest ever
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know an air compressor could be so quiet. The quality control could use some work. Tilting it from side to side sounded like a handful of sand was in the tank. I took the drain valve off and turned it on and shook it until everything came out. It turned out to be welding slag and a 3 inch piece of welding wire. Somebody complained about the wheels but they only go on one way. If you have them flipped over facing the wrong way they rub against the brackets and don't turn. Flip them over and you are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: loads

customer_reviews.title: Quiet as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely luv this compressor! Replaces a pancake that finally failed after 10 years. Came very well packaged in a heavy duty box. Simply attached the 2 wheels, the rubber bumper, and the 2 air filters to the intakes and it was up and running. I have a short retractable hose connected to the one port to blow my woodworking tools off, and a 50-ft ceiling-mounted hose reel to the other port to power my tools and fill tires, etc. Fills quickly and runs quite awhile without recycling. Pros: Very quiet as claimed Easy to assemble Heavy enough to not walk around while running Cons: Handle a little low to the ground (I'm 6' 2")
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: a dream come true
customer_reviews.text: This is my third air compressor in 40 years. My first was a used twin piston, loved it, miss it. Then got an oil less unit, 25 gallon. OMG noisy unit, I had to get rid of it after a few years, drove me CRAZY. This new California is freakin awesome! Fill 10 gallon tank in 2 minutes from dead empty and tops off in 30 seconds. So quiet I can use it in the house and carry on a conversion in the same room or even talk on the phone. It is quiet. After 6 months of use, no problems. Sorry piston compressor, you have been bumped out of first place!
customer_reviews.author: cat man too

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised. The manifold is made of very ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. The manifold is made of very cheap cast pot metal and I broke off one of the attachment points. The pressure switch is small and kind of flimsy. The quick disconnects do not fit all disconnect fittings. But you get what you pay for and this compressor is quiet and inexpensive. I think I got my $ worth and the limited duty cycle is appropriate for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great.
customer_reviews.text: Yes quiet, but VERY heavy. Only a strong person can lift it. They don't tell you that if you install a wheel wrong-side out, it won't turn. There no way to tell which is the wrong say until you try to roll it. Someone who gets both wheels wrong would think they don't roll, because they don't. The instructions assume that you are familiar with compressors so don't expect much help assembling it. But once assembled, it works great! I LOVE the subdued sound, about 70% of my last compressor.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: 1Year 4months of Everyday Use!! Dead Electric Box
customer_reviews.text: I used this consistently for 1year 4months on home remodeling and was very happy (spraying, nailing, sawing, etc.).. UNTIL yesterday the Electric box blew. Warranty is only 1year. It was bullet proof and I would say I got my money's worth because I got much accomplished. Very quiet and portable enough to carry up a flight of stairs. IF it isn't one thing its the other with these compressors. It'd be nice if they offered extended warranty to 3 years. Would I buy it again? $350 is high. I'm thinking of the 1HP 6.3 gallon $199. I have a Husky 30gallon compressor in the garage that rarely gets used after I bought this. Food for thoughts.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Goon

customer_reviews.title: Should Have Bought One Long Ago
customer_reviews.text: One of the finest compressors around. Reliable, quiet as a church mouse, excellent craftsmanship. Love the dual output as I can handle multiple tools at the same time without switching hoses or chucks. Very bottom heavy so it does not tip or move when set down. Only con is that handle is so low that it makes it clumsy to move around. Will probably add an extension to handle to make it easier to move. Strongly recommend for places where noise of a compressor is critical (inside remodeling, small shop, etc.).
customer_reviews.author: llohans

customer_reviews.title: Quiet & fast filling
customer_reviews.text: My workshop is in my basement. So a noisy compressor resonates up to the main floors. My previous compressor was the PorterCable 6 gallon pancake style....and noisy. It required atleast 5 loud minutes to pressurize the tank. The California Air compressor is not only MUCH more quiet, it requires only half the amount of time to fill ... even though the the tank is over 50% larger. Expensive? Yes. So the buyer should compare the value of the sound & pressurizing speed vs the cost.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Schulze

customer_reviews.title: It is like taking a quiet compressor and then putting it under ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a rather quiet compressor already so I assumed this is as quiet as them. But no. This is in a class by itself. It is like taking a quiet compressor and then putting it under a blanket! It just purrs. I see that other companies are coming up with the same unit under their name/brand. So I suspect this is a product of a Chinese company that is getting different OEM wins and this is the first one. Either way, it is a great unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amir M.

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Compressor.
customer_reviews.text: I love this compressor. I had a Harbor Fright pancake compressor for nearly 20 years that was quite loud to the point it was uncomfortable to stand next to while running. It finally crapped out, so after reading many reviews, I bought a CAT-10020. It is quiet, barely audible. And it reaches a much higher pressure than my old compressor, and because it holds a lot more air it doesn't cycle as much. It was easy to put the wheels on. I only to change a small fitting on my air hose to make the connection.
customer_reviews.author: Monaskon

customer_reviews.title: Okay compressor
customer_reviews.text: It is very quiet but my wife and son says not. The handle is small and not easy to move around without dropping it so be careful. The tank is only 10 gallons not enough for impact wrenches. Would have been 5 stars if for not the deficiencies. Good for air nails, etc., but not wrenching.
customer_reviews.author: Keiko

customer_reviews.title: Much quieter then other compressor I've used from local hardware ...
customer_reviews.text: Much quieter then other compressor I've used from local hardware retailers. Note all compresses are going to make noise, this is the quietest I've ever used. Powerful enough using both outputs for all application used, remove tires and inflate tires, framing, carpentry and upholstery.
customer_reviews.author: ERA

customer_reviews.title: AMAZINGLY QUIET!!
customer_reviews.text: My hubby was so excited to get this as a gift. I love it because when he is working in the garage I can't hear it in the house. IT'S AMAZINGLY QUIET. I gave him this one to replace his little pancake air compressor and this thing is WAY quieter than his smaller one.
customer_reviews.author: M B Ambrose

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my Porter Cable 6 gallon pancake compressor that just wouldn't hold a charge and shook the house every time it ran. This unit is quiet. You can actually carry on a conversation with it running. Quality construction. Arrived with no damage. Did not take long to set up. Be sure to protect the relief valve on the bottom while assetling.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Seyler

customer_reviews.title: Nice Machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nicely designed and built machine. It is light years head of the one I bought from a big box store years ago. My only thing is that when you own a piece of equipment as nice as this you notice small imperfections. The wheel base was mounted a little out of alignment on the tank from the rest of the machinery. This is strictly a cosmetic issue, however, and has no impact on the way the machine functions.
customer_reviews.author: Barry P. Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: The answer for me.
customer_reviews.text: As quiet as promised and ideal for what I have to do. This unit runs inside of a "showroom" and saves me from having to provide compressed air from high pressure tanks. The sound level is so low and the 10 gallon tank big enough so that even when it must run there is no distraction. The entire unit looks sharp and professional. No leaks, no oil on the floor and no racket. I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lotus Jay

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Just got it, initially very impressed. It is very quiet and it has plenty of air flow more- than expected. I'm used to the Harbor Freight or even worse Rigid compressors so this one in comparison is much better quality, I can't speak about the hi-end compressors. Cant make judgment about longevity but I will advise later...
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: but quite pleased and beats anything in the same size I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used long, but quite pleased and beats anything in the same size I have ever used. Very quiet and fast recovery. Looks well built for consumer use. Does get hot to the touch on longer runs. Don't know how well it will work when it is 110 deg F outside. Not designed for 100% duty cycle.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, but...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the product, this is auctually the second one I have bought. The only reason I gave it 4 sates instead of 5 was beacuse they ran the price up right before Father's Day.... I would probably have done that too, but I am less fond of it when I am on the reviving end.
customer_reviews.author: Justin H.

customer_reviews.title: *** Quiet ***
customer_reviews.text: It's very quiet! Fills up quickly and you can use painting spray guns with it. One of the fittings for the air line broke. It rattles around the exhaust and the header. The handle is way to short. If you are 5' - 5' 6" then you might not have a problem with it. If you are 6' then it is really bad.
customer_reviews.author: toobad

customer_reviews.title: Love being able to talk over it in the shop
customer_reviews.text: So Quiet! Love being able to talk over it in the shop. I just wish they had washers or spacers between the wheels and the bars, in order to tighten it enough that the wheels dont fall off, they dont roll well.
customer_reviews.author: III

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I only wish there was a 0 star option. I have had this item for 6 months now and, is it quiet? Of course it is, because it doesnt work! So, I can't use it. Now that is quiet!!! The company's customer service has been no help at all. If you are considering this product, do yourself a favor now and move on...
customer_reviews.author: Hallsa

customer_reviews.title: The Best Aircompressor
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best small air compressor I have ever used. It is so quite that you can carry on a conversation with the next person without shouting. Easy to assemble. However the wheels and bolts to attach them could be a little stronger. But all in all it is on great, quite compressor.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Received the CAT-10020C with disappointment. However the CAT-10020 is still a great stand-up
customer_reviews.text: Received the CAT-10020C with disappointment. However the CAT-10020 is still a great stand-up, very quiet, air compressor.
customer_reviews.author: Froi

customer_reviews.title: Quiet as advertised, love it
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at how much noise this compressor didn't make. It is really quiet. You can have a normal conversation while this thing is running. It was damaged in shipping though. The packaging was inadequate for a 100lb piece of equipment. The steel brace for the wheel was bent pretty good and the paint was scratched off in a few places. I would order a replacement, but I'm not sure that another one would arrive in better shape. This is a well built, solid piece of equipment. I would have rather purchased this from a local store.
customer_reviews.author: rik fleming

customer_reviews.title: So quiet
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly quiet, yet plenty powerful. Used it to lay hardwood flor in my entire home, never skipped a beat. Best part is, it was in the room with me and i could still have a conversation. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Kerns

customer_reviews.title: ... this a couple years now and I couldn't be happier with it
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this a couple years now and I couldn't be happier with it. It's small and takes up little space. It is unbelievably quiet compared to a normal air compressor...Enough cannot be said about that.
customer_reviews.author: OrangeyougladIdidntsaybanana

customer_reviews.title: In my skin
customer_reviews.text: When it comes on barely notices it a few feet away. No more jumping out of my skin! I can believe it's so quiet. Why doesn't everyone make them this way. It was pricey but now I feel it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Bilster

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome build quality. This has the most quiet motor I have ever heard. Fills the tank In about a minute from completely empty. 2 quick connect fittings for effortless hookup with one hand. Best air compressor I have ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua S Schaffer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.  My 2nd one this year.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd unit from California Air Tools. I'm blown away by the quiet level of these units. I think they are worth every penny and purchasing them through Amazon (both have been bought that way) is a breeze. Can't speak highly enough about them. I use a small one in my shop for light air tools and purchased this one for my garage - will use a hvlp spray gun with it and other air tools.
customer_reviews.author: Chad W.

customer_reviews.title: I really like that its quiet
customer_reviews.text: I really like that its quiet. great for small tools that use periodic bursts of air but not for constant release such as a sander or spray gun as it cannot keep tank pressurized. as for my needs, wish I would've got one with more capacity. other than that, its a nice little compressor.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this item about 8 months ago and the regulators ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item about 8 months ago and the regulators is leaking / failed. Unit is very quite but reliability is not up to standards.
customer_reviews.author: PC7060

customer_reviews.title: Great Air compressor
customer_reviews.text: Awsome air compressor never had one that come close to being as quiet as this one. The only complaint I have is they didn't send enough hardware to mount the wheels for them to work correctly. I had to purchase two washers and a lock nut for each side, because with the hardware they sent wouldn't stay tight when you would roll it.
customer_reviews.author: heath davidson

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and Efficient
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best air compressors that I have owned. It is really quiet and very efficient for various jobs. It is like buying a Honda generator where the DB is very low. You and your neighbors will be happy when you purchase this air compressor. One of the best tool money can buy and I own the 10.0 and the 6.3
customer_reviews.author: Danny B

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I am blown away by how quiet this air compressor is. I know it's rated as being quiet but I didn't expect it to be that much quieter than any others. It recovers quickly too and seems to be well built. Note, the wheels will rub if put on backwards..there is an inside and outside to the wheels. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Keeps up with most spray guns and is very quiet. Built solidly. Had wheel clearance issues but was easily solved with a few washers. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: FHCIII

customer_reviews.title: quiet but quality is not good
customer_reviews.text: worked for 30 days then quit. was only using it about an hour a day every other day. it is very quiet though.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Giovino

customer_reviews.title: Totally awesome. Hardly a man has seen it who doesn't oodle over it. It's weird, but reflects the quiet, capable, good product
customer_reviews.text: Totally awesome. Hardly a man has seen it who doesn't oodle over it. It's weird, but reflects the quiet, capable, good product that it is.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Now this is the best of the best very very quiet running, Thanks again
customer_reviews.author: Chazman Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Silent power
customer_reviews.text: This puppy is QUIET. Keeps up with two framing nailers no problem. Highly suggest this even if you have a bigger compressor
customer_reviews.author: Vartz04

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Worst customer service ever. My air compressor worked great until the motor fried. I still have a warranty but they will not stand behind their product. They said there was too much dust in the motor which is total BS. Do not buy one of these air compressors. Not worth 500 bucks. There are much better compressors on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Matt P.

customer_reviews.title: Must have for the do it yourselfer!
customer_reviews.text: The best compressor I have ever owned. It's super quiet and I can still hear the music in my garage with it fires up. Great recovery as well.
customer_reviews.author: iambigd

customer_reviews.title: Received a Customer Return?
customer_reviews.text: TOP OF SHIPPING BOX SECURED WITH CLEAR TAPE AND NOT STAPLED. COOLING FIN BENT. PLASTIC BEADS LOOSE IN THE BOX. BUT EVERYTHING WORKS.
customer_reviews.author: uturn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my small shop (garage). It woks seamless and quietly. It worths every penny
customer_reviews.author: Santiago Garcia

customer_reviews.title: This compressor is great. Very quiet and builds pressure fast
customer_reviews.text: This compressor is great. Very quiet and builds pressure fast. Bought this from damaged freight, but only damage to unit was motor exhaust grate on one side pushed in. Repaired that quickly. Love the way it keeps up with use and holds operating pressure. Buy It !!
customer_reviews.author: SmittyFix

customer_reviews.title: Extremely quiet and powerful
customer_reviews.text: Powerful, quiet, good size, excellent choice for the occasional mechanic. It will run your wrenches, inflate tires, blow stuff, etc. I didn't try it on powerful tools, but my guess is that will run nail guns and other medium consumption tools. I hope it will last, considering the price. Very impress though by the noise level.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandru

customer_reviews.title: Two hookups which is nice because I paint double fisted
customer_reviews.text: SO QUIET it's a big change from the Kobalt and the Husky. Two hookups which is nice because I paint double fisted, like I drink
customer_reviews.author: Crispy Morton

customer_reviews.title: A Welcome Addition
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this compressor to supply a spray gun in my wood shop. It not only has plenty of air for a LVLP gun but it is the quietest air compressor I have ever owned (by far).
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: This thing actually works great and it's whisper quite
customer_reviews.text: so quite I can hear myself think. This thing actually works great and it's whisper quite:)
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: So quiet. Not strong enough to blow out our ...
customer_reviews.text: So quiet. Not strong enough to blow out our sprinklers.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing because it is very strong and quiet. I show it off to everyone that comes over and they notice how quiet it is every time.
customer_reviews.author: rich

customer_reviews.title: very quite compared to other brands
customer_reviews.text: VERY quite compared to other brands. Works fine also and have had no issues in the past 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Quiet. That's for sure. Seems like some minor quality checks are being overlooked or ignored. The potential is there for this to be a great compressor. Unfortunately, still needs some slight tightening and adjusting as well as some straightening of compressor fins. These cannot be blamed on shipping alone. Even if that was the case, perhaps some strategically applied thread locker would do the trick? Furthermore, more robust packaging for shipping would resolve other instances of "oops". Overall, a good product. Just pay a little more attention to what ships out the door. That could make all the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Lukoser

customer_reviews.title: Huh is this thing running
customer_reviews.text: I re-build &re-finish pianos. Just recently I've become irritated by the noise of the compressor going on and off. That's when I started looking for something a little quieter. This is just the ticket super quiet with plenty of air.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome machine. very quite....i used at home and i can't hear it running when inside
customer_reviews.author: brian hewitt

customer_reviews.title: ... first "real" air compressor and I think it runs great. I hope it lasts for many years to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first "real" air compressor and I think it runs great. I hope it lasts for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Quiet
customer_reviews.text: This compressor has plenty of volume for my HVLP spray gun and runs less than my 3 hp Makita did with one half the noise. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon James

customer_reviews.title: Quite and powerful
customer_reviews.text: I custom paint for a living. I use this compressor for airbrush and hvlp guns. The compressor has no problem keeping up. It is quite enough for me to answer the phone 10 feet away.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: A very good air compressor
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected! A very good air compressor. Take a look at the wheels to make sure you don't put them on backwards, if you do, they won't spin. Holds pressure too, overnight mine still had 120 psi. Nice quiet unit without oil!
customer_reviews.author: golferdude

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be cheaply made for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have had this compressor for about a year now and am not very impressed with the quality of the tool. First it came with some of the parts damaged and although the response for new parts was quick, I was still not impressed with the quality of the parts. Many of the parts are plastic and just did not seem to hold up. I have already had to do some of my own adaptation to keep the covers that go over the fans on the machine. Although It is very quiet I would not necessarily recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: So quiet you could hear a mouse fart.
customer_reviews.text: So quiet and runs great keeps up with my air sander and spray guns
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic mobile compressor. It is as quiet as they say. I am very happen with this.
customer_reviews.author: Gordo

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality. We are rning it 10 hrs a ...
customer_reviews.text: I was suprised how well this was made. Very good quality. We are rning it 10 hrs a day 5 days a week. It is very quiet and runs for a little over one minute to fill from empty. Highly recommend this compressor.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff beauchamp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice, and quiet compressor and the seller is great
customer_reviews.author: Brownmaia

customer_reviews.title: Better than what we had expected
customer_reviews.text: All the employees are very happy with this quiet compressor. The Home Depot models were rattling our skulls. Delivery was much faster than we had anticipated. Everything was as advertised and exceeded our expectations
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Jordan

customer_reviews.title: still running great and
customer_reviews.text: Had this for several months. Use it daily for 8hr duty cycle. still running great and quiet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great compressor for the home
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet, quick refill. Great compressor for the home handyman
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great compressor, directions/manual does not talk about the low ...
customer_reviews.text: Great compressor, directions/manual does not talk about the low pressure cut off on the pump to tank connection, but after just running the unit it was apparent how it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Goebel

customer_reviews.title: Best compressor ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and extremely quiet!! Highly recommend to anyone who needs a good general use compressor that you can leave on so it's always ready and not notice you did!
customer_reviews.author: wade Hurtt

customer_reviews.title: Great compressor
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this 10020 oil free compressor on a Sunday and was delivered the next Thursday. Fast!! It arrived in top condition. I installed the wheels and filters (piece of cake). Fired it up and it ran perfect. It has fast recovery and is as quiet as advertised. The unit is of good quality. It weighs 70+ pounds but I don't plan on packing it around so it's all good. I can recommend it very highly.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, and has more than enough tank size for an airbrush. Has an odd smell when purchased.
customer_reviews.author: fossilhead

customer_reviews.title: Was mucher quieter than my previous compressor
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to assemble. Two air outlets eliminated some homebrew hardware I devised for my old compressor and it was quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Can't say enough good about this compressor.
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, quick recovery, compact, quality construction. I am using this compressor constantly in a residential neighborhood and i don't have to worry about the neighbors complaining.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rucker

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: My son-in-law loved this item. He had it on his wish list and is very happy with it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Elvie Vannoy

customer_reviews.title: Does an excellent job. No air leaks as noted in some ...
customer_reviews.text: Quiet at advertised. Does an excellent job. No air leaks as noted in some other evaluations. Holds pressure well.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Giff

customer_reviews.title: Really wanted to love, but it's just okay
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to love, but it's just okay. If you need a compressor that you'll use on occasion and will just sit in the corner of your garage, this is the one. Very quiet and easy to use. I own a construction company and this is just not built to be hauled around. Mufflers break off, wheels come lose, other fittings break. Just isn't built to be thrown in the back of the pickup and driven around. Too bad, super quiet, just not sturdy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Log Builder

customer_reviews.title: Extremely quiet unit
customer_reviews.text: I replacement my noisy Craftsman air compressor with the quiet Calif air compressor. Extremely quiet & excellent product. Only complaint is handle is short.
customer_reviews.author: Donald L & Dee  Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Fits the bill
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Solidly built. Not silent, but relatively quiet. You can carry on a conversation standing right next to it while it is running without shouting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: extremely unhappy
customer_reviews.text: worked twice. Nice and quiet operation then the motor kept running until the safety shut off. Checked to make sure tank was drained and nothing. Looks rusty inside. Now when I turn it on, I get no pressure at all. Just outside of Amazon 30 day warranty.I am very displeased since I needed it for a big work project, thank god i have a manual press as back up.
customer_reviews.author: michael kabrin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did what I expect it to do and it is quiet
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Quality construction and very quiet
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my garage for household and automotive/ motorcycle related jobs. Runs super quiet compared to my previous Craftsman compressor.
customer_reviews.author: Devyn G. Damore

customer_reviews.title: Nice compressor and extremely quiet
customer_reviews.text: Nice compressor and extremely quiet. I used it to winterize my 10 zone irrigation system but it took 90 mins. Great for pumping up the car tires, air mattresses and pool toys.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Poorly welded tank
customer_reviews.text: It maybe quiet, but I didn't attempt to try. The tank center piece was poorly aligned. I've never seen anything like this before. Definitely not professional grade. Perhaps not even safe since they rust on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: E.R.

customer_reviews.title: It is the quietest...
customer_reviews.text: When remodeling inside someone's home and the compressor kicks on conversations have to stop. However, that isn't the case with this compressor. It is truly the quietest compressor we've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: A great quiet compressor
customer_reviews.text: Nice and quiet, holds pressure just fine. No problem with the wheels. Very pleased with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: James L.

customer_reviews.title: great but needs 20 amp circuit
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet but not perfect. The first one leaked air from the bottom shut off valve and drew 19 amps so it wouldn't work in my garage. Returned that one through amazon because the manufacturer was not wanting to. He said they all vary in amps from 13 to 20 and that is normal. Second one won't kick back on after full until I install a 20 amp circuit.
customer_reviews.author: PHXScorpion

customer_reviews.title: As quiet as advertised and helpful, friendly phone support
customer_reviews.text: The compressor is as quiet as advertised, and the company representative was extremely knowledgeable and friendly when I called to get more information on it.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Sarrack

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing quality and workmanship.
customer_reviews.text: Compressor plumbing was broke when I received it. Tried to fix but fittings were glued together not threaded like all good compressors. I sent the unit back. Was very surprised that Amazon would carry a product that was so poorly made. Would not recommend to anyone.. Compressor might have been good but workmanship and quality of total unit were very poor. The only good thing was that the compressor was very quite. I'm not sure if compressor put out as much air as advertised because I never got the broken line fixed.
customer_reviews.author: larry sparling

customer_reviews.title: Great Compressor!
customer_reviews.text: This compressor is great! It is fast to reach max PSI and is quiet. The quietest I have ever been around.
customer_reviews.author: wywxman

customer_reviews.title: I love my compressor it is the best thing
customer_reviews.text: I love my compressor it is the best thing ever
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo quinonez

customer_reviews.title: It is not to noisy
customer_reviews.text: Kind of quiet and fast enough for my small shop. It has a slow leak with nothing hooked up to the unit, that I have not been able to find. The service people are very good to work with,
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Mattern

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: better have a great power supply or this thing sucks
customer_reviews.author: jenni hardy

customer_reviews.title: Works great & it is much quieter than my Craftsman 1
customer_reviews.text: Works great & it is much quieter than my Craftsman 1.5 gallon compressor. It fills quickly and it has a small foot print.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

product_meta.title: California Air Tools CAT-10020 Ultra Quiet and Oil-Free 2.0 HP 10.0-Gallon Steel Tank Air Compressor
product_meta.description:
The CALIFORNIA AIR TOOLS 10020 Ultra Quiet air compressor is designed to be one of the quietest 2.0 Hip electric air compressors in the industry having only 70 decibels of sound. The powerful 2.0 HP motor operates at only 1680 RPM creating less noise and less wear. The Oil-Free Dual Piston Pump System is engineered for high performance and durability. The oil-free pump allows you to use in different temperatures and uneven terrains. The 10.0 gallon steel air tank with wheels is easy to store and move freely. The 10.0 gallon air tank will fill (from empty to full) in less than 130 seconds. The control panel comes complete with 2 - 1/4" quick release connectors that will allow you to use up to 2 tools at the same time. This air compressor delivers 5.30 CFM at 90 PSI allowing you to use larger air tools and more air tools at the same time. Having a low amp draw of only14.0 amps allows you to use normal 15 amp outlets. Powerful and maneuverable this air compressor is ideal where noise in a shop, garage or work area is a major issue.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The California Air Tools 10020 Ultra Quiet air compressor is designed to be one of the quietest 2.0 Hp electric air compressors in the industry having only 70 decibels of sound. The powerful 2.0 HP motor operates at only 1680 RPM creating less noise and less wear. The Oil-Free Dual Piston Pump System is engineered for high performance and durability. The oil-free pump allows you to use in different temperatures and uneven terrains. The 10.0-Gallon steel air tank with wheels is easy to store and move freely. The 10.0-Gallon air tank will fill (from empty to full) in less than 130 seconds. The control panel comes complete with 2 – 1/4” quick release connectors that will allow you to use up to 2 tools at the same time. This air compressor delivers 5.30 CFM @ 90 PSI allowing you to use larger air tools and more air tools at the same time. Having a low amp draw of only14.0 amps allows you to use normal 15 amp outlets. Powerful and maneuverable this air compressor is ideal where noise in a shop, garage or work area is a major issue.
feature_bullets: Oil-Free Pump for Less Maintenance & Costs
Easy Start Valve, Allows for a no load start, for a low start up amp draw, Only 14-amps
